```{r barefed, fig.cap="EF", cache=cacheon}

prop <- pdata %>%
  filter(!is.na(num_Ef)) %>%
  count(num_Ef) %>%
  complete(num_Ef = 0:100) %>%
  mutate(
    n = replace_na(n, 0),
    prop = n / sum(n) * 100
  )

b <- barplot(prop$prop,
  col = global_cols[4],
  border = global_cols[4],
  ylim = c(0, 11),
  ylab = "Percent",
  xlab = "EF (%)",
  axes = FALSE,
  xaxs = "i",
  yaxs = "i"
)
axis(1, b[, 1][seq(1, length(b[, 1]), 5)], seq(0, 100, 5), las = 2)

axis(2, seq(0, 11, 1), c(seq(0, 10, 1), 100), las = 2)
plotrix::axis.break(2, 10.5, style = "slash")
```
